Masterfully transformed into a spacious, stylish and inspiring residence of considered design, from its cohesive modern concept to high-end appointments and fittings imbued throughout, this home has been beautifully refurbished to create a lasting impression.
Dedicated to exemplary family living and entertaining, this luxurious sanctuary is positioned only a short commute from boutique shops, thriving café culture at Heathmont Village, Heathmont Railway Station and prestigious educational institutions.
Upon entry, the mood reflects a contemporary edge. A soothing combination of high ceilings, neutral tones and Spotted Gum timber hardwood floors perfectly harmonise together, with the result being a relaxed, chic interior.
There's a great sense of flow and connectivity throughout the house, with the highly functional floorplan placing the formal lounge at the front of the home and the open-plan living area at the rear. Unhindered cosiness has been achieved with the inclusion of a wood heater in the formal lounge while the brilliantly planned family/meals domain is further magnified by the comfort and convenience of a gas log fire, TV wall niche, bespoke cabinetry and built-in speakers.
Large stacker doors undoubtedly frame the view of the majestic Dandenongs, as well as folding back to integrate the family zone with the huge outdoor entertaining deck-perfect when hosting large events. Hand-crafted built-in seating and outdoor speakers are yet another example of the unmatched detail this home has on offer, as is the natural stone paving adjoining the deck.
Surveying the family/meals area, the white-on-white Caesarstone kitchen is impressively designed for the accomplished cook. Showcasing a series of quality appointments, the kitchen features stainless steel appliances; electric double oven, gas stove and Asko dishwasher, soft-close drawers, pendant lighting over the island bench finished with a waterfall edge, large pantry, Subway tile splashback and veggie mixer.
The main bedroom comprises a walk-in robe, pendant lighting and full luxurious ensuite enhanced by a walk-in rain shower, wall-hung twin vanity and large format floor-to-wall tiles. Three additional bedrooms are fitted with double built-in robes while the bathroom incorporates a freestanding deep-soak bath, frameless rain shower, square-profile tapware and vanity topped with Bamboo timber, adding an organic feel.
Set on a large 938m2 (approx.) block, every detail has been carefully curated to ensure a luxury lifestyle is enjoyed. Further highlights list as; large laundry with cupboard and bench space, gas ducted heating, refrigerated heating/cooling, plantation shutters, plush carpet, roof storage area, square-set plastering and full landscaping. Sensor lighting and ample parking is provided on the exposed aggregate driveway with electric gates opening up to a carport at the side of the home, as well as a garage at the rear. Every corner of the property has been immaculately finished.
The home looks and feels new with practically every inch having been updated, including; hot water system, electrical, plumbing, driveway, floor coverings, amenities, maintenance-free weatherboard exterior and fully re-stumped. The improvements are too extensive to list in its entirety.
This home is well located, just a brief walk from Tinternvale and Heathmont East Primary Schools, Tintern Grammar, Wombolano Park, Tarralla Creek, as well as being within close reach of Aquanation, Our Lady of Perpetual Help Primary School, Aquinas College, cafes, restaurants and EastLink freeway.
This beautiful bespoke residence has been intuitively designed to afford the family or couple an exceptional home where socialising, entertaining and joy are imbued into everyday living. We welcome your inspection.

Description:
Entry to a superb family location
Surrounded by wide manicured lawns and a picket fence, this charming weatherboard family home boasts immense street presence, and is located on a corner block just metres from leafy Dandenong Creek Trail and Bayswater Secondary College.
Opening onto a light-filled living room with wood fireplace, the home features a spacious family kitchen with a European freestanding gas cooker, dishwasher and corner pantry. Adjacent, a dining area flows directly out to an expansive elevated alfresco entertaining space overlooking meticulously landscaped gardens, with a lawn framed by established lavender beds, raised vegetable gardens, fruit trees and a secure chicken yard. Three carpet bedrooms are equipped with built-in wardrobes, and are serviced by a newly renovated central bathroom with stone mirrored vanity, heated towel rail, seamless glass shower and a luxurious freestanding bathtub.
Comprising polished timber floors throughout, the home also features ducted heating, air conditioning, a water tank, a full laundry with outdoor access, and a single lock-up garage with workshop space plus additional secure off-street parking. Placed within easy walking distance of Bayswater Station and local shopping and cafes, the home is also set close to Bayswater Primary and Heathmont Golf Park.

Description:
BEAUTIFULLY PRESENTED AND A BIG BLOCK
This very much loved family home will appeal to buyers seeking additional space, convenience and exciting future potential. Immaculately presented and positioned on an extra generous 926m2 allotment, the home is perfect for first home buyers, investors or developers (STCA) and is placed only moments from both Croydon and Mooroolbark station and amenities. Move in and enjoy as is, renovate with your own style stamp or look to develop the large block (STCA) and reap the rewards.
The home boasts a traditional floorplan with a large and bright kitchen with walk in pantry, plentiful bench and cupboard space, dishwasher and stainless-steel wall oven. An adjacent meals zone is perfect for casual meals and has easy access to the huge covered alfresco for effortless entertaining. Off the kitchen is an L-shaped lounge/dining with built in bar for your downtime whilst you sit back and enjoy the big screen. Positioned off the sunlit entrance is a hallway leading to three bedrooms including a magnificent master retreat with walk-in robe, built in triple robes and a stunning fully renovated ensuite. A family bathroom services the minor bedrooms.
Additional highlights include an abundantly sized backyard with lush lawn, 10 solar panels (1.5kw), 9000L water tank, ducted evaporative cooling and ducted heating, reverse cycle air-conditioning and ducted vacuum system. Furthermore, there is a double roller door garage and separate roller door storage offering vehicle accommodation or a workshop along with plenty of off-street driveway parking.
The property has the added convenience of having both Mooroolbark and Croydon shops, kindergartens, supermarkets, station and cafes minutes away, along with easy access to Croydon shopping precincts and all their fabulous amenities. Its also an easy commute to a choice of quality surrounding schools, Chirnside Shopping Centre and the EastLink freeway. Dont delay. Enquire today.
